sentences.sContent: I went upstairs and had a shower.
She’s upstairs in bed feeling ill.
sentences.sCn: 她身体不舒服，在楼上躺着。

sentences.sContent: Marsani moved into the upstairs apartment.
sentences.sCn: 玛萨妮搬进了楼上的公寓。

synos.tran: 在楼上，向楼上；上楼；往楼上

trans.tranCn: 在楼上，向楼上；上楼；往楼上
trans.tranOther: towards or on an upper floor in a building
An upstairs room or object is situated on a floor of a building that is higher than the ground floor
one or all of the upper floors in a building
